description: Pelor is the god of the sun and the summer. He is the god of bountiful harvest and the full celebration of life itself. Many adherents of Pelorâ€™s faith, consider him to be the patriarchal head of all the gods.

Moradin is the father of dwarves, the god who carved them fully grown from the flesh of the great mount Unterkwelv and bestowed in them all his own love of craft and creation. Every dwarven forge is a temple to Moradin. His symbol, a double sided hammer above an anvil hangs proudly in every dwarven home.
